title: Barley and Tomato Soup
ingredients: ['160g chopped onions', '120g chopped celery', '120g chopped carrots', '2 teaspoons finely chopped garlic', '2 tablespoons vegetable oil', '600ml water', '2 tomatoes, diced', '1 (400g) tin chopped tomatoes with juice', '300ml chicken stock', '4 tablespoons pearl barley', '1/8 teaspoon ground black pepper']
